Title: Relates to the ability of a taxing jurisdiction to opt out of the exemption from taxation for certain energy systems
Summary: Provides that a taxing jurisdiction which has opted out of the exemption from taxation for certain energy systems may not offer the exemption for specific or single projects; requires that a jurisdiction which changes its status relating to the exemption must do so within 120 days prior to the taxable status date; provides that such change shall be valid for one year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the ability of a taxing jurisdiction to opt out of the exemption from taxation for certain energy systems
